html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12292023-12-08PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder Declining to Refer Back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2023-245
PrecisORDER DECLINING TO REFER BACK TO THE CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION BROADCASTING DECISION CRTC 2023-245 in order to decline to set aside or refer back to the CRTC for reconsideration and hearing the decision contained in the Broadcasting Decision CRTC Decision 2023-245 of August 8, 2023 which administratively renews the broadcasting licences for various television and distribution services.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER DECLINING TO REFER BACK TO THE CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION BROADCASTING DECISION CRTC 2023-245 in order to decline to set aside or refer back to the CRTC for reconsideration and hearing the decision contained in the Broadcasting Decision CRTC Decision 2023-245 of August 8, 2023 which administratively renews the broadcasting licences for various television and distribution services.
